title: What is one goal that traumatized an entire country ? I'll start with this one, Maxi Rodriguez banger vs Mexico.

author: Beneficial_Ad_1072
text: 2x Mbappe 2018.. the Argies still have nightmares, even a WC can’t erase that pain lol

author: AgusWayne
text: Nah, we don't really care for losing at that stage with a useless coach. We were prepared for that, and the fact that France ended up wining the cup took some of the sting away. Goetze in 2014, that remains painfull

author: TuvixWasMurderedR1P
text:
2014 hurt the most though. We made it all the way to the final, in Brazil no less. The hunger to win for Argentina was much greater in 2014 than in Russia.

But I did remember Mbappe’s speed in 2018 and it did scare me before this last WC final. His speed alone nearly got us in the final as well.

author: International_Pair86
text: not really... 2014 was way worse... and the fact that Argentina won over France last cup made it less relevant

text: 2022 France almost beat Argentina's asses thanks to a Mbappe hattrick and that shot on goal by kolo muani which was saved by Martinez. I would say this is much more scary compared to 2018
